original_title: Janaka Wakkumbura appointed State Minister of Environment
original_body_lines: Janaka Wakkumbura has been sworn in as the State Minister of Provincial Councils, Local Government and Environment before President Ranil Wickremesinghe at the Presidential Secretariat in Colombo, a short while ago.
The President’s Media Division reported that this appointment supplements his existing role as the State Minister of Provincial Councils and Local Government.
